verses.verse: דְּבַר־ <WH1697> The word יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> that הָיָ֔ה <WH1961> came אֶל־ <WH413> to יוֹאֵ֖ל <WH3100> that came to Joel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son פְּתוּאֵֽל׃ <WH6602> of Pethuel

שִׁמְעוּ־ <WH8085> Hear זֹאת֙ <WH2063> O הַזְּקֵנִ֔ים <WH2205> this ye old men וְהַֽאֲזִ֔ינוּ <WH238> and give ear כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all יוֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> all ye inhabitants הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the land הֶהָ֤יְתָה <WH1961> happened זֹּאת֙ <WH2063> in בִּֽימֵיכֶ֔ם <WH3117> Hath this been in your days וְאִ֖ם <WH518> or even בִּימֵ֥י <WH3117> in the days אֲבֹֽתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1> your fathers'

עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> and לִבְנֵיכֶ֣ם <WH1121> ye your children סַפֵּ֑רוּ <WH5608> Tell וּבְנֵיכֶם֙ <WH1121> of it and [let] your children לִבְנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH1121> [tell] their children וּבְנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1121> and their children לְד֥וֹר <WH1755> generation אַחֵֽר׃ <WH312> another

יֶ֤תֶר <WH3499> hath left הַגָּזָם֙ <WH1501> That which the palmerworm אָכַ֣ל <WH398> eaten הָֽאַרְבֶּ֔ה <WH697> hath the locust וְיֶ֥תֶר <WH3499> hath left הָאַרְבֶּ֖ה <WH697> and that which the locust אָכַ֣ל <WH398> eaten הַיָּ֑לֶק <WH3218> hath the cankerworm וְיֶ֣תֶר <WH3499> hath left הַיֶּ֔לֶק <WH3218> and that which the cankerworm אָכַ֖ל <WH398> eaten הֶחָסִֽיל׃ <WH2625> hath the caterpiller

הָקִ֤יצוּ <WH6974> Awake שִׁכּוֹרִים֙ <WH7910> ye drunkards וּבְכ֔וּ <WH1058> and weep וְהֵילִ֖לוּ <WH3213> and howl כָּל־ <WH3605> all שֹׁ֣תֵי <WH8354> all ye drinkers יָ֑יִן <WH3196> of wine עַל־ <WH5921> account עָסִ֕יס <WH6071> because of the new wine כִּ֥י <WH3588> That נִכְרַ֖ת <WH3772> for it is cut off מִפִּיכֶֽם׃ <WH6310> from your mouth

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For גוֹי֙ <WH1471> For a nation עָלָ֣ה <WH5927> is come up עַל־ <WH5921> and אַרְצִ֔י <WH776> upon my land עָצ֖וּם <WH6099> strong וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> and without מִסְפָּ֑ר <WH4557> and without number שִׁנָּיו֙ <WH8127> whose teeth שִׁנֵּ֣י <WH8127> [are] the teeth אַרְיֵ֔ה <WH738> of a lion וּֽמְתַלְּע֥וֹת <WH4973> and he hath the cheek teeth לָבִ֖יא <WH3833> of a great lion לֽוֹ׃

שָׂ֤ם <WH7760> He hath laid גַּפְנִי֙ <WH1612> my vine לְשַׁמָּ֔ה <WH8047> waste וּתְאֵנָתִ֖י <WH8384> my fig tree לִקְצָפָ֑ה <WH7111> and barked חָשֹׂ֤ף <WH2834> he hath made it clean חֲשָׂפָהּ֙ <WH2834> bare וְהִשְׁלִ֔יךְ <WH7993> and cast [it] away הִלְבִּ֖ינוּ <WH3835> thereof are made white שָׂרִיגֶֽיהָ׃ <WH8299> the branches
אֱלִ֕י <WH421> Lament כִּבְתוּלָ֥ה <WH1330> like a virgin חֲגֻֽרַת־ <WH2296> girded שַׂ֖ק <WH8242> with sackcloth עַל־ <WH5921> For בַּ֥עַל <WH1167> for the husband נְעוּרֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5271> of her youth

הָכְרַ֥ת <WH3772> is cut off מִנְחָ֛ה <WH4503> The meat offering וָנֶ֖סֶךְ <WH5262> and the drink offering מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> from the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD אָֽבְלוּ֙ <WH56> mourn הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> the priests מְשָׁרְתֵ֖י <WH8334> ministers יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD'S

שֻׁדַּ֣ד <WH7703> is wasted שָׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> The field אָבְלָ֖ה <WH56> mourneth אֲדָמָ֑ה <WH127> the land כִּ֚י <WH3588> for שֻׁדַּ֣ד <WH7703> is wasted דָּגָ֔ן <WH1715> for the corn הוֹבִ֥ישׁ <WH3001> is dried up תִּיר֖וֹשׁ <WH8492> the new wine אֻמְלַ֥ל <WH536> weak יִצְהָֽר׃ <WH3323> the oil

הֹבִ֣ישׁוּ <WH954> be ashamed אִכָּרִ֗ים <WH406> O ye husbandmen הֵילִ֙ילוּ֙ <WH3213> howl כֹּֽרְמִ֔ים <WH3755> O ye vinedressers עַל־ <WH5921> For חִטָּ֖ה <WH2406> for the wheat וְעַל־ <WH5921> and שְׂעֹרָ֑ה <WH8184> and for the barley כִּ֥י <WH3588> Because אָבַ֖ד <WH6> is perished קְצִ֥יר <WH7105> because the harvest שָׂדֶֽה׃ <WH7704> of the field

הַגֶּ֣פֶן <WH1612> The vine הוֹבִ֔ישָׁה <WH3001> is dried up וְהַתְּאֵנָ֖ה <WH8384> and the fig tree אֻמְלָ֑לָה <WH535> languisheth רִמּ֞וֹן <WH7416> the pomegranate גַּם־ <WH1571> also תָּמָ֣ר <WH8558> tree the palm tree וְתַפּ֗וּחַ <WH8598> also and the apple tree כָּל־ <WH3605> All עֲצֵ֤י <WH6086> [even] all the trees הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <WH7704> of the field יָבֵ֔שׁוּ <WH3001> are withered כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Indeed הֹבִ֥ישׁ <WH3001> is withered away שָׂשׂ֖וֹן <WH8342> because joy מִן־ <WH4480> From בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> from the sons אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> of men ס

חִגְר֨וּ <WH2296> Gird וְסִפְד֜וּ <WH5594> yourselves and lament הַכֹּהֲנִ֗ים <WH3548> ye priests הֵילִ֙ילוּ֙ <WH3213> howl מְשָׁרְתֵ֣י <WH8334> ye ministers מִזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> of the altar בֹּ֚אוּ <WH935> come לִ֣ינוּ <WH3885> lie all night בַשַּׂקִּ֔ים <WH8242> in sackcloth מְשָׁרְתֵ֖י <WH8334> ye ministers אֱלֹהָ֑י <WH430> of my God כִּ֥י <WH3588> for נִמְנַ֛ע <WH4513> is withholden מִבֵּ֥ית <WH1004> from the house אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <WH430> of your God מִנְחָ֥ה <WH4503> for the meat offering וָנָֽסֶךְ׃ <WH5262> and the drink offering

קַדְּשׁוּ־ <WH6942> Sanctify צוֹם֙ <WH6685> ye a fast קִרְא֣וּ <WH7121> call עֲצָרָ֔ה <WH6116> a solemn assembly אִסְפ֣וּ <WH622> gather זְקֵנִ֗ים <WH2205> the elders כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> all יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> [and] all the inhabitants הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the land בֵּ֖ית <WH1004> [into] the house יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <WH430> your God וְזַעֲק֖וּ <WH2199> and cry אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

אֲהָ֖הּ <WH162> Alas לַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> for the day כִּ֤י <WH3588> for קָרוֹב֙ <WH7138> [is] at hand י֣וֹם <WH3117> for the day יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וּכְשֹׁ֖ד <WH7701> and as a destruction מִשַׁדַּ֥י <WH7706> from the Almighty יָבֽוֹא׃ <WH935> shall it come

הֲל֛וֹא <WH3808> not נֶ֥גֶד <WH5048> before עֵינֵ֖ינוּ <WH5869> before our eyes אֹ֣כֶל <WH400> Is not the meat נִכְרָ֑ת <WH3772> cut off מִבֵּ֥ית <WH1004> from the house אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <WH430> angels שִׂמְחָ֥ה <WH8057> [yea] joy וָגִֽיל׃ <WH1524> and gladness

עָבְשׁ֣וּ <WH5685> is rotten פְרֻד֗וֹת <WH6507> The seed תַּ֚חַת <WH8478> under מֶגְרְפֹ֣תֵיהֶ֔ם <WH4053> under their clods נָשַׁ֙מּוּ֙ <WH8074> are laid desolate אֹֽצָר֔וֹת <WH214> the garners נֶהֶרְס֖וּ <WH2040> are broken down מַמְּגֻר֑וֹת <WH4460> the barns כִּ֥י <WH3588> for הֹבִ֖ישׁ <WH3001> is withered דָּגָֽן׃ <WH1715> for the corn

מַה־ <WH4100> How נֶּאֶנְחָ֣ה <WH584> groan בְהֵמָ֗ה <WH929> How do the beasts נָבֹ֙כוּ֙ <WH943> are perplexed עֶדְרֵ֣י <WH5739> the herds בָקָ֔ר <WH1241> of cattle כִּ֛י <WH3588> Because אֵ֥ין <WH369> there מִרְעֶ֖ה <WH4829> because they have no pasture לָהֶ֑ם <WH1992> them גַּם־ <WH1571> Even עֶדְרֵ֥י <WH5739> yea the flocks הַצֹּ֖אן <WH6629> of sheep נֶאְשָֽׁמוּ׃ <WH816> are made desolate

אֵלֶ֥יךָ <WH413> to you יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> O LORD אֶקְרָ֑א <WH7121> to thee will I cry כִּ֣י <WH3588> For אֵ֗שׁ <WH784> for the fire אָֽכְלָה֙ <WH398> hath devoured נְא֣וֹת <WH4999> the pastures מִדְבָּ֔ר <WH4057> of the wilderness וְלֶ֣הָבָ֔ה <WH3852> and the flame לִהֲטָ֖ה <WH3857> hath burned כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֲצֵ֥י <WH6086> all the trees הַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <WH7704> of the field

גַּם־ <WH1571> Even בַּהֲמ֥וֹת <WH929> The beasts שָׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> of the field תַּעֲר֣וֹג <WH6165> cry אֵלֶ֑יךָ <WH413> about כִּ֤י <WH3588> for יָֽבְשׁוּ֙ <WH3001> are dried up אֲפִ֣יקֵי <WH650> also unto thee for the rivers מָ֔יִם <WH4325> of waters וְאֵ֕שׁ <WH784> and the fire אָכְלָ֖ה <WH398> hath devoured נְא֥וֹת <WH4999> the pastures הַמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> of the wilderness פ
